Title: Alo
Writer: Noelle Valdivia, Tony Saltzman, David E. Kelley (created by), Jonathan Shapiro (created by)
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Nina Arianda, Ana de la Reguera, Tania Raymonde
Plot: Billy tries a risky strategy to suppress the prosecution's two key pieces of evidence, hoping he can clear Julio's name before trial even begins.
